channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bins on pavement and blocking gate entry, 20th June
item.description:
Fly-tipping and bins blocking pavement and entry to gate into building and bike storage. Corner shop should remove bins from pavement and place somewhere appropriate. Issue has been ongoing for 2+years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harrow Manorway, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned lime bike, 20th June
item.description:
I have reported over 7 days ago (ref 17113492 from Lime) and they said they would get local team to investigate. The bike is still here and also encouraging anti social behaviour. It's now blocking the pavement and have stopped mobility impaired pedestrians to struggle to get past. Please can this bike be removed ASAP. There is no lime bike operation within out borough of Redbridge someone has abandoned it here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Flora Gardens, Chadwell Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish keft, the council arent clearing it away, 20th June
item.description:

item.title: Potholes, 20th June
item.description:

item.title: Flytipped bags of paint cans, 20th June
item.description:
Several bags of paint cans have been fly tipped. This is a frequent fly tipping location, so I would appreciate if this could be resolved quickly so that it doesn’t attract more rubbish. If there is anything we can do to discourage fly tipping here, that would also be great! Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Wingfield Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Seymour Street, Marylebone, London

item.title: Car dumped for months, tax expired 31Mar25, 20th June
item.description:
This car has been dumped alongside 3 others in this end of Wrottesley Road, it has not moved in months and it’s not taxed. The tax expired 31st March 2025. I think the person dumping this has also dumped at least 4 cars on the same road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wrottesley Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
